alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 10:30AM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17 feet, considerable flooding of lowlands occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:05 AM CDT Monday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 17.4 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall to 17.2 feet and begin rising again early Thursday morning. It will rise to 17.7 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 17 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
